name: Candy Pop
description:
Candy Pop is a simple and highly addictive Puzzle Game.

The idea is simple, clear the board by popping the candy. Each candy has 4 sizes, once it gets to its maximum size it pops. The juice from the popping candy makes adjacent candies expand.

Create Pop chains for massive score and multiplier boosts!

Enjoy, be safe and Have Fun.

Code, design and graphics by me.
Music by Chris Huelsbeck.
